name: Holey Golf - Brackeys GameJam #3
description: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3/[IN DEVELOPMENT] You are on a golf course, but you have no paddle. The only way to move the ball is to tilt the whole playground in any direction. The physics will do the rest! But lookout, there are many holes in the ground! If the ball falls in a hole, you have to pay with your points. On top of that, the golf course is swinging. If you touch the blue hologram, you get points. Be aware that you lose points if the ball falls into the holes. You can also jump, which is very useful to avoid the dangerous holes. If your score is high enough you get some cups which are very useless but nice to own :) There are more or less useful items spread over the golf course. Camera: swap the view. Try it out. Its funny :DSpring: gives you 5 very useful jumpsLock: closes all the annoying holesClock: gives you a few seconds more to grindArrows: stops the waves for a short momentBEST ITEM IN THE WORLD if (game.isFun) sendMessage("Nice game") //Thanks :)
